verses.verse: Be ye <S%G1096><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> imitators <S%G3402><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> love <S%G26><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> you <S%G2248><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> up for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, an offering <S%G4376><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> an odor <S%G3744><s%> of a sweet smell <S%G3744><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> uncleanness <S%G167><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> covetousness <S%G4124><s%>, let it <S%G3687><s%> not even <S%G3366><s%> be named <S%G3687><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> becometh <S%G4241><s%> saints <S%G40><s%>;

nor <S%G2532><s%> filthiness <S%G151><s%>, nor <S%G2532><s%> foolish talking <S%G3473><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> jesting <S%G2160><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> are <S%G433><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> befitting <S%G433><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> giving of thanks <S%G2169><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> ye know <S%G1097><s%> of a surety <S%G2075><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> no <S%G3956><s%> fornicator <S%G4205><s%>, nor <S%G2228><s%> unclean person <S%G169><s%>, nor <S%G2228><s%> covetous man <S%G4123><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> an idolater <S%G1496><s%>, hath <S%G2192><s%> any <S%G3756><s%> inheritance <S%G2817><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

Let <S%G538><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> deceive <S%G538><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> empty <S%G2756><s%> words <S%G3056><s%>: for because of <S%G1063><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of disobedience <S%G543><s%>.
Be <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> ye <S%G1096><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> partakers <S%G4830><s%> with them <S%G846><s%>;

For <S%G1063><s%> ye were <S%G2258><s%> once <S%G4218><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> are now <S%G3568><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>: walk <S%G4043><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> of light <S%G5457><s%>

(for <S%G1063><s%> the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of the light <S%G4151><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> goodness <S%G19><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>),
proving <S%G1381><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> well-pleasing <S%G2101><s%> unto the Lord <S%G2962><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G4790><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> fellowship <S%G4790><s%> with the unfruitful <S%G175><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> of darkness <S%G4655><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> reprove them <S%G1651><s%>;

for <S%G1063><s%> the things which <S%G3588><s%> are done <S%G1096><s%> by them <S%G846><s%> in secret <S%G2931><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> a shame <S%G150><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to speak <S%G3004><s%> of <S%G5259><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> when <S%G3588><s%> they are reproved <S%G1651><s%> are made manifest <S%G5319><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> that is made manifest <S%G5319><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> light <S%G5457><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%>, Awake <S%G1453><s%>, thou that <S%G3588><s%> sleepest <S%G2518><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> arise <S%G450><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> shall shine <S%G2017><s%> upon <S%G2017><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>.

Look <S%G991><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> carefully <S%G199><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> ye walk <S%G4043><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> unwise <S%G781><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%>;
redeeming <S%G1805><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%>.
Wherefore <S%G5124><s%> be ye <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> foolish <S%G878><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> understand <S%G4920><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of the Lord is <S%G2962><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> be <S%G3182><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> drunken <S%G3182><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%>, wherein <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> riot <S%G810><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> be filled <S%G4137><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>;

speaking <S%G2980><s%> one to another <S%G1438><s%> in psalms <S%G5568><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hymns <S%G5215><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> songs <S%G5603><s%>, singing <S%G103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> making melody <S%G5567><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> to the Lord <S%G2962><s%>;

giving thanks <S%G2168><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>;
subjecting <S%G5293><s%> yourselves one to another <S%G240><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the fear <S%G5401><s%> of Christ <S%G2316><s%>.
Wives <S%G1135><s%>, be in subjection unto <S%G5293><s%> your own <S%G2398><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> unto the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> of the wife <S%G1135><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> Christ also <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G5547><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%>, being <S%G2532><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> the <S%G2076><s%> saviour <S%G4990><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> is subject to <S%G5293><s%> Christ <S%G2532><s%>, so <S%G3779><s%> let the wives <S%G1135><s%> also be to their <S%G2398><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%>.

Husbands <S%G435><s%>, love <S%G25><s%> your <S%G1438><s%> wives <S%G1135><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G3860><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> up for <S%G5228><s%> it <S%G846><s%>;
that <S%G2443><s%> he <S%G846><s%> might sanctify <S%G37><s%> it <S%G2511><s%>, having cleansed it by the washing <S%G3067><s%> of water <S%G5204><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%>,

that <S%G2443><s%> he might present <S%G3936><s%> the church <S%G846><s%> to himself <S%G1438><s%> a glorious <S%G1741><s%> church <S%G1577><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> spot <S%G4696><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> wrinkle <S%G4512><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> such thing <S%G5108><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> it should be <S%G5600><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> without blemish <S%G299><s%>.

Even so <S%G3779><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%> also to love <S%G25><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> own wives <S%G1135><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> bodies <S%G4983><s%>. He that <S%G3588><s%> loveth <S%G25><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> own wife <S%G1135><s%> loveth <S%G25><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> ever <S%G4218><s%> hated <S%G3404><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> nourisheth <S%G1625><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cherisheth <S%G2282><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> Christ <S%G2962><s%> also the church <S%G1577><s%>;
because <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> body <S%G4983><s%>.

For <S%G473><s%> this cause <S%G5127><s%> shall <S%G2641><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> leave <S%G2641><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall cleave <S%G4347><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> shall <S%G2071><s%> become <S%G1519><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>.

This <S%G5124><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> great <S%G3173><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> speak <S%G3004><s%> in regard <S%G1519><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G1519><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> do25, 2596 ye also <S%G2532><s%> severally1538, 3779 love <S%G25><s%> each one <S%G1520><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> own wife <S%G1135><s%> even as <S%G5613><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> let the wife <S%G1135><s%> see that <S%G2443><s%> she fear <S%G5399><s%> her husband <S%G435><s%>.
